title: AceTheOnlyOne
author: AceTheOnlyOne
content: Is it possible to use domains as ways to mine crypto. If so does it have to be web3 domains or does regular ones work as well?

comments.author: miner29
comments.body: No domains have nothing to do with mining.

comments.author: AceTheOnlyOne
comments.body: I know they currently don’t I was wondering if there’s a way to use a domain name somehow to utilize one of the consensus or protocols. Maybe like proof of connectivity? Or have multiple sites trying for the same block chain? I’m not sure exactly but I feel like there’s something there that can be utilized

comments.author: miner29
comments.body: Again what you think might be is not mining and does not belong here becuase…..its not mining or even mining related.
